content.question: On the Qur’an page shown, the additional red, green, and gold marks that were placed close to the brown calligraphic script are a significant departure from other examples of Arabic calligraphy and were included to

choices.label: indicate the patron’s wealth through the use of expensive and rare colored dyes
serve as design elements that contrast with the horizontal and vertical lines of the letters
indicate ownership of the document as it was passed down through generations
visually assist with the readability and oral recitation of such an important text

content.answer: visually assist with the readability and oral recitation of such an important text
